body: Shepherds of the lakes and seas, aquatic druids guard ecosystems ranging from shallows streams to deep ocean trenches, ministering to their residents and communing with the tides.
name: Aquatic Druid
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid

sections.body: An aquatic druid's wild empathy functions only on creatures that have a swim speed or the aquatic or water subtype; however, she can improve the attitude of any such creature with Intelligence 2 or less regardless of type, including mindless creatures.
sections.name: Wild Empathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Wild Empathy

sections.body: At 2nd level, an aquatic druid gains an insight bonus on Initiative checks and Knowledge (geography), Perception, Stealth, Survival, and Swim checks equal to 1/2 her druid level in aquatic terrain, and she cannot be tracked such environments. This ability replaces woodland stride.
sections.name: Aquatic Adaptation
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Aquatic Adaptation

sections.body: At 3rd level, an aquatic druid gains a swim speed equal to half her land speed. This ability replaces trackless step.
sections.name: Natural Swimmer
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Natural Swimmer

sections.body: At 4th level, an aquatic druid gains a +4 bonus on saving throws against spells of the water type or the exceptional or supernatural abilities of creatures with the aquatic or water subtype. This ability replaces resist nature's lure.
sections.name: Resist Ocean's Fury
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Resist Oceans Fury

sections.body: An aquatic druid gains this ability at 6th level, except that her effective druid level for the ability is equal to her druid level – 2.
sections.name: Wild Shape
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Wild Shape

sections.body: At 9th level, an aquatic druid gains the aquatic subtype, the amphibious trait, and a swim speed equal to her land speed. She also can endure cold climate effects as if using endure elements. This ability replaces venom immunity.
sections.name: Seaborn
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Seaborn

sections.body: At 13th level, an aquatic druid gains DR/slashing or piercing equal to 1/2 her level. This damage reduction also applies against spells and spell-like abilities that inflict damage by grappling or crushing (e.g., black tentacles, crushing hand). She never takes pressure damage from deep water. This ability replaces a thousand faces.
sections.name: Deep Diver
sections.url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Aquatic Druid/Deep Diver
